metadata.name: Vitruvian Vader
metadata.description:
"I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death." - Leonardo da Vinci

Vitruvian Vader is a Darth Vader rendition of 'The Vitruvian Man' by the Italian Renaissance artist and scientist Leonardo da Vinci. It can be found in is the tenth episode of the DSC ART WARS collection, 'Back Against Da Wall'. 

DSC ART WARS is an epic saga that externalizes the inner dialogues of web3 and the relationship between a powerful art collector & the Art Empire and the resistance led by a group of noble art creators & small collectors who want to restore balance to the art world.
